text: Kapena (jwambone ni) Ajula jwaagumbile mawunde ni mataka, ni kuntuluchisya kuumila kwinani mesi (gawula), ni tumesisye ni galakwego matimbe gana uwigo gagakwete kusalalila? Nganiuwa kukwenu (ukombosi) wanti nikumesya itela yakwe. Ana pana nnungu jwine pampepe ni Allah? (Ngwamba!) Nambo wanganyao niwandu waakuwika chakulandanyichisya (ni Jwalakwe pakuchigalagatila)
